name: Snake Tetris
description:
Snake tetris is an arcade puzzle game in which you have to eat animals (snake) and arrange them in line inside your stomach (tetris) to digest them and get points for a succesful lunch.

Controls:

wasd - move snake

arrows - move eaten animals

space - start the game 

Made especially for Mini Jam 71: Puzzles (Combine 2 different game genres)

Music: Snake III JAVA game theme song
